[/font][font=Verdana]Name:  Mystia
Race:  Nord
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  .99
Weight:  80
Body:  UNP, CBBE, & SeveNBase options
Skin:  Fair Skin Optimized
Location:  Whiterun - Arcadia's Cauldron (Upstairs Usually)
Armor:  Sotteta Necromancer

Levels with player. Nord traits/bonuses.
Destruction Related Perks & Spells (specifically fire spells)

ENB:  RealVision & Vividian
Tested with AFT & EFF

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/myyeex53b/20160909212939_1.jpg[/img]
